channel.title: ARs on T8R Loadouts
channel.description: Recent content in ARs on T8R Loadouts

item.title: FFAR
item.description: Still viable FFAR. Item Attachment Muzzle Suppressor Laser Tiger Team Spotlight Stock Raider Stock Rear Grip Serpent Wrap Ammunition STANAG 50 Rnd I’ve never tried this setup, but it seems interesting. Looks like a loadout that favors shorter range, but would probably rip.

item.title: GRAU
item.description: Probably the best gun to have a fully loaded class for endgame. Item Attachment Muzzle Monolithic Suppressor Barrel Tempus 26.4" Archangel Underbarrel Commando Foregrip Ammunition 60 Round Mags Perk Fully Loaded If you just want a regular GRAU, swap Fully Loaded for a Tac Laser.

item.title: XM4
item.description: I put this in for Kevin. I don’t expect anyone to use it lol. Long range build. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 13.5" Task Force Optic Axial Arms 3x Ammunition STANAG 60 Rnd Underbarrel Field Agent Grip Close range build. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Laser Tiger Team Spotlight Stock Raider Pad Ammunition 45 Rnd Rear Grip Airborne Elastic Wrap Alternative: JGOD has Microflex LED Optic swapped in for Tiger Team Spotlight.

item.title: Krig
item.description: Underrated. Conor and Steb can vouch. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 15" CMV Mil-Spec Optic Axial Arms 3x Rear Grip Airbborne Elastic Wrap Ammunition STANAG 60 Rnd Alternative: Better recoil control with 15" Mil Spec Barrel. Swap to 19" Ranger for quicker ADS but tougher recoil.

item.title: RAM7
item.description: Ramm it in. Item Attachment Muzzle Monolithic Suppressor Barrel FSS Ranger Optic VLK 3.0x Optic Underbarrel Commando Foregrip Ammunition 50 Round Mags

item.title: FARA
item.description: Still good for now. Item Attachment Muzzle GRU Suppressor Barrel 18.7" Spetsnaz RPK Barrel Optic Axial Arms 3x Underbarrel Spetsnaz Grip Ammunition Spetsnaz 60 Rnd If you’re good and don’t need recoil control help, you can swap the Spetsnaz Grip for a GRU Elastic Wrap on the Rear Grip for quicker ADS.

item.title: C58
item.description: Probably sucks, but they say it’s good. Item Attachment Muzzle Agency Suppressor Barrel 18.5" Task Force Optic Axial Arms 3x Underbarrel Field Agent Grip Ammunition STANAG 55 Rnd Alternative: Swap the Field Agent Grip for the Airborne Elastic Wrap Rear Grip for quicker ADS, but more recoil.

item.title: AK (CW)
item.description: The real feel AK, from Cold War. IceManIssac Sniper Support Build Item Attachment Muzzle GRU Suppressor Barrel 20" Spetsnaz RPK Barrel Optic Microflex LED Stock KGB Skeletal Stock Ammunition 45 Rnd JGOD Sniper Support Build Item Attachment Muzzle GRU Suppressor Optic Microflex LED Stock KGB Skeletal Stock Ammunition 45 Rnd Rear Grip GRU Elastic Wrap Long Range: Item Attachment Muzzle GRU Suppressor Barrel 20" Spetsnaz RPK Barrel Optic Axial Arms 3x Underbarrel Spetsnaz Grip Ammunition 45 Rnd Alternative: Some were swapping the GRU Suppressor for a regular suppressor right now.
